title: 3 Simple Ways to Unsubscribe From Crunchyroll Premium

steps.title: Open https://www.crunchyroll.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Open https://www.crunchyroll.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already signed in, click the person icon in the top-right corner and click Log in . Enter your email or username and password. Crunchyroll allows you to watch with friends and get into anime with their wide selection. However, you may want to cancel or unsubscribe from your membership if you find that you aren't utilizing the premium perks. If you need to cancel a renewal, you can do so after the first 24 hours. Once you cancel, you'll have access to your membership until the end of your billing period. If you're cancelling a free trial, the trial will end immediately.

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. This will be in the top-right corner. [1] X Research source A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click My Account.
steps.content: Click My Account . You can find this underneath History .

steps.title: Click Membership Plan.
steps.content: Click Membership Plan . This will be on the left panel, underneath the General header.

steps.title: Click Cancel Membership.
steps.content: Click Cancel Membership . This will be in the Action box. Your subscription will be cancelled. [2] X Research source If you don't see the Cancel Membership button, you may have subscribed with another platform. Try to cancel using iOS or using Android instead. To delete your account after unsubscribing, go to Nuke page. Make sure you're logged in. Select a reason for your deactivation, enter your password, and click Deactivate Now . Deactivating your account cannot be undone.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. Use this method if you subscribed to Crunchyroll using your Apple ID and want to cancel your membership.

steps.title: Tap your Apple ID.
steps.content: Tap your Apple ID. You can find this at the very top. Make sure you're signed into the correct Apple ID.

steps.title: Tap Subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Subscriptions . This will be underneath Payment & Shipping . You'll see a list of all your active subscriptions associated with your Apple ID.

steps.title: Tap Crunchyroll.
steps.content: Tap Crunchyroll . The list will be in alphabetical order, separated into Active and Inactive categories.

steps.title: Tap Cancel Subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel Subscription . This will be in red font, at the very bottom.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . Your Crunchyroll subscription will be cancelled. You will still have access to your subscription until the date listed. Afterwards, your account will return to its free version. If you want to delete your Crunchyroll account after cancelling your subscription, Open the Crunchyroll app. Go to Account → Delete My Account → Continue .

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store app.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store app. This looks like a multi-colored "play" icon. [3] X Research source Use this method if you subscribed to Crunchyroll via the Google Play Store and want to cancel your membership. Alternatively, you can also change your payment method .

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This will be in the top-right corner. [4] X Research source If you have multiple Google accounts connected, select the correct account from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Payments & subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Payments & subscriptions . You can find this underneath Library .

steps.title: Tap Subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Subscriptions . This will be underneath Payment methods .

steps.title: Tap Crunchyroll.
steps.content: Tap Crunchyroll . The apps will be listed in alphabetical order. Find Crunchyroll underneath the Active header.

steps.title: Tap Cancel subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel subscription . This will be at the bottom-right corner. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Select a reason and tap Continue.
steps.content: Select a reason and tap Continue . Google will ask why you want to cancel the subscription. Select a reason, or tap Decline to answer .

steps.title: Tap Cancel subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel subscription . Your Crunchyroll subscription will be cancelled. You will still have access to your subscription until the date listed. Afterwards, your account will return to its free version. If you want to delete your Crunchyroll account after cancelling your subscription, Open the Crunchyroll app. Go to Account → Delete My Account → Continue .
